source: TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_SEQ_00<tab>The Vath deftarm overlooks the guild with satisfaction.
target: TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_SEQ_00<tab>ヴァスの塚のウデキキは、冒険者に伝えたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_SEQ_01<tab>The Vath deftarm greets you warmly and tells you that the colony is thriving. Many new Vath are inspired by the guild's humble beginnings, choosing their purpose as adventurers under the deftarm's tutelage. Admitting that he is no good with sentimentality, he asks you to visit the storyteller, who also wanted to speak with you.
target: TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_SEQ_01<tab>ウデキキから、冒険者のギルドでの働きを感謝された。ストーリーテラーも、礼を言いたいようだ。ヴァスの塚の「ストーリーテラー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_SEQ_02<tab>The storyteller expresses gratitude on behalf of Loth ast Vath for your efforts to help the hive. He observes that while the Overmind is well aware of the Vath's strength in allies and has been keeping tight guard over his subjects, there are always those who escape to the sanctuary, and he is eager to tell their story. The storyteller imparts upon you the Vath will not forget what you have done for them, and to ever consider yourself a part of the hive.
target: TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_SEQ_02<tab>ストーリーテラーと話した。彼は冒険者に感謝を告げ、冒険者と「分かたれし者たち」の物語を語り続けるという。

source: TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_UDEKIKI_000_000<tab><click> <click> Master, what a pleasant surprise. Even though you are so busy with your own quests, I am glad you always stopped by to help me with the Adventurers' Guild. I could not have done it without you.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_UDEKIKI_000_000シシシシシ……師匠。
師匠にも「やりたいこと」があるはずなのに、
冒険者ギルドの依頼をたくさんこなしてくれて、ありがとう！

source: TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_UDEKIKI_000_001<tab>Our colony thrives, Master. Our new brothers and sisters are inspired by the guild's beginnings and your generous help. Many now seek my tutelage to become adventurers themselves. They seek me as the one who learned from you.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_UDEKIKI_000_001塚の同胞も、師匠の働きに感化されて、
舞い込む依頼を我先にと、こなしてくれてるんだ。
オイラは、新たに「分かたれ」た同胞の指導に追われているよ！

source: TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_UDEKIKI_000_002<tab>I would say more, but you know I am no good with these things. No good at all. The words come out strange. But the storyteller wanted to see you, too. I think he could tell you better than I.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_UDEKIKI_000_002塚の長からも、師匠にお礼を言いたいみたいだから、
「ストーリーテラー」に声をかけてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_UDEKIKI_000_005<tab>The storyteller wished to speak with you about something important. Yes, important. Please seek him out.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_UDEKIKI_000_005塚の長からも、師匠にお礼を言いたいみたいだから、
「ストーリーテラー」に声をかけてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_STORYTELLER_000_010<tab><click> <click> Kind hunter, generous hunter, you have contributed to our humble hive more than you know. And for that, we are truly grateful.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_STORYTELLER_000_010シシシシシ……果てしなく気前のいいヒトの狩人よ、
ヴァスの塚に大層貢献してくれたこと、大いに感謝する！

source: TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_STORYTELLER_000_011<tab>The Overmind now knows of our strength. We are certain he will do all in his power to keep his hold on the Onemind. But there will always be those who stray; there will always be Vath.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_STORYTELLER_000_011狩人には、我々「分かたれし者たち」の「友」として、
特別に強固な繋がりを感じるぞ！

source: TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_STORYTELLER_000_012<tab>More Vath means more individuals, those with different minds and feelings. We cannot hope to agree on everything, but we accept this divergence. Even if it leads us to clash amongst ourselves, it is worth our freedom.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_STORYTELLER_000_012ときに……「繋ぎ止めし者」に「恐怖」を植え付けたせいか、
近頃、新たに「分かたれ」る同胞が増え続けている。

source: TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_STORYTELLER_000_013<tab>Through our colony's trials to preserve our existence, we will continue to tell our story. And we do not forget those who joined us in our struggles.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_STORYTELLER_000_013それは結構なことだが、同胞の数が増えれば増えるほど、
異なる個の意見が対立し、争いが生じるかもしれぬ。

source: TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_STORYTELLER_000_014<tab>We had no choice when we were linked to the Overmind. But now, we choose to strengthen our bonds with you, hunter. You may ever consider us your brothers and sisters.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_STORYTELLER_000_014そのとき同胞同士で殺し合うような道を歩まぬよう、
「個」を尊重する教えを伝えるため、我は物語り続けよう。
ひとりのヒトと出会い、我らが真に「分かたれ」た物語をな。

source: TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Bloodsworn<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the Vath.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_SYSTEM_000_100「グナース族：分かたれし者たち」との友好関係が、
「誓約★」になりました。
冒険者の働きによって、彼らと固い約束で結ばれたようです。

source: TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>You will receive an experience point bonus upon completion of the Vath beast tribe daily quests.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA006_02260_SYSTEM_000_101これ以降、「グナース族：分かたれし者たち」の、
「蛮族デイリークエスト」で獲得できる経験値に、
いっそうのボーナスが付加されます！
